choices.content: ![A coordinate plane with two lines. The x- and y-axes both scale by two. The line labeled f passes through the points (0, 0) and (2, 2). The line labeled g passes through the points (0, negative 5) and (2, negative 3).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/f1c31c9a31c988f00e354ea6dec1015d1345d481)

![A coordinate plane with two lines. The x- and y-axes both scale by two. The line labeled f passes through the points (0, 0) and (2, 2). The line labeled g passes through the points (0, 5) and (2, 7).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/c2455ecf31b9dca406b6d237c565d192c9e68304)

![A coordinate plane with two lines. The x- and y-axes both scale by two. The line labeled g passes through the points (0, 0) and (2, 2). The line labeled f passes through the points (0, 5) and (2, 7).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/172d861640abd5e0a83f27658dd1088f9a7a7cc6)

![A coordinate plane with two lines. The x- and y-axes both scale by two. The line labeled g passes through the points (0, 0) and (2, 2).
